allCaughtUpDesc: You've reviewed all your cards for today. Come back later for more!
subtitle: Strengthen your memory with spaced repetition
noMistakes: Perfect session! No mistakes to review.
srsExplainer: Cards you find easy appear less often. Cards you struggle with appear more frequently. This is the most efficient way to memorize.

complete.title: Review Complete!
complete.subtitle: Great job on your study session
complete.practiceWeakDesc: Strengthen your understanding with targeted practice

encouragement.noCards: No cards to review right now. Check back later!
encouragement.outstanding: Outstanding! Your memory is on fire! Keep up the excellent work!
encouragement.great: Great job! You're building strong memories. Consistency is key!
encouragement.good: Good progress! Those tricky cards will get easier with practice.
encouragement.keepItUp: Keep it up! Regular review sessions will help these stick better.
encouragement.default: Every review strengthens your memory. The cards you found hard will be shown again soon!
